title: Heart Parade
writer: Wiktor Piatkowski, Natalia Matuszek, Marianna Pochron
short_cast: Anna Próchniak, Michał Czernecki, Iwo Rajski, Monika Krzywkowska, Kamil Szeptycki, Piotr Rogucki, Grzegorz Warchoł, Vasyl Vasylyk, Katarzyna Zielińska, Maria Czerepińska
cast: Anna Próchniak, Michał Czernecki, Iwo Rajski, Monika Krzywkowska, Kamil Szeptycki, Piotr Rogucki, Grzegorz Warchoł, Vasyl Vasylyk, Katarzyna Zielińska, Maria Czerepińska
genre: Polish, Romantic Comedies, Family Features, Comedies, Romantic Movies

desc: To save her job, a dog-fearing, career-minded woman must travel to Kraków, where she meets a charming widower, his son and their four-legged best friend.
